comment: Smokey nose but not so Smokey taste, very smooth
Smoky, peaty, and a hint of fruit.  Not a very complex tasting whiskey, but mild and pleasant.
Rich, Smokey, not very complex. Dark chocolate, fruit

Kind of "medical" smell. Not the desinfection kind, but kind of "harsh medicine". The taste is surprisingly sweet and rich like with rhubarb pie. There is nice tingling afterburn. I can taste bit of "sea" in aftertaste. After a few tastes hints of peat. Overall, the taste is nice, interesting.
Good smoky whisky, good notes and a Nice lingering taste
